settings.templatedesc: Customize the look and feel of the invoice
settings.frequencydesc: Specify the frequency of when invoices are sent
settings.namingdesc: Set invoice number based on different conditions
settings.irpfdesc: Set IRPF % when invoice is issued from an individual (not a company)
settings.numberpatterndesc: Set the length of the number part of your invoice number. EG 000000 would give an invoice number like ABC-000492
settings.prefixdesc: Use this field to add a prefix to your invoice numbers. If you want your invoice number to look like ABC-123, then add ABC- tothis field. You can also use [year] to use the current year
settings.suffixdesc: Use this field to add a suffix to your invoice numbers. If you want your invoice number to look like 123-ABC, then add -ABC tothis field. You can also use [year] to use the current year
settings.nextinvoicenumberdesc: Use this field to change the next Invoice Number. You MUST increase this number, you can not save a smaller number than the current number
settings.filenameformatdesc: Set the file name format for your invoice so recipients be able to identify your invoice easily. Default is [company_name]-[invoice_number]
settings.qaaccesssettingdesc: Activate to have Q & A only visible to the user who asks them and the admins or assigned tutor (if applicable)
settings.generalmemberreplysettingdesc: Activate to allow members to post responses to messages
settings.admincitymap: Admin SEDE user will be assigned to the city selected
